fullText:
如何轻松写出好用的提示词模板？

最近我分享了很多 AI 提示词，大部分提示词都能收到用户的留言分享他们基于我的提示词创作的成果，之所以大家都能轻松的基于我的提示词进行二次创作，是因为我刻意把提示词写成了“提示词模板”，让其他人只要做少量修改就可以产生新的结果。 https://t.co/voDSyoCsvk

user.name: 10 Minute Drill
user.description: Your morning 10-minute rundown of the most important stories in news and politics, hosted by veteran political strategist @mattdizwhitlock. New episodes T/Th.

fullText:
When @secduffy took over the DEpt. of Transportation he found an air traffic control system relying on floppy discs and post-it notes. 

Perhaps if @petebuttigieg had spent more time on transportation and less time fighting racist highways, we would have safer skies. https://t.co/YHExKI7H40
